knob

restrict: 'ACM'

NameTypeDesciption
ngModel = Model Knobs Value get/set
knob No parameter knob attribute enables knob directive
NameDesciption
data-min min value | default=0.
data-max max value | default=100.
data-step step size | default=1.
data-angleOffset starting angle in degrees | default=0.
data-angleArc arc size in degrees | default=360.
data-stopper stop at min & max on keydown/mousewheel | default=true.
data-readOnly disable input and events | default=false.
data-rotation direction of progression | default=clockwise.
UI :
data-cursor display mode "cursor", cursor size could be changed passing a numeric value to the option, default width is used when passing boolean value "true" | default=gauge.
data-thickness gauge thickness.
data-lineCap gauge stroke endings. | default=butt, round=rounded line endings
data-width dial width.
data-displayInput default=true | false=hide input.
data-displayPrevious default=false | true=displays the previous value with transparency.
data-fgColor foreground color.
data-inputColor input value (number) color.
data-font font family.
data-fontWeight font weight.
data-bgColor background color.
More info and examples at http://anthonyterrien.com/knob/ 
<input type="text" ng-model="knobnumber" knob data-width="80" data-height="80" data-fgcolor="#6597ea" data-thickness=".2" data-angleoffset="180">
<input type="text" ng-model="knobnumber" knob data-width="80" data-height="80" data-displayprevious="true" data-thickness=".2" data-min="-100" data-angleoffset="-125" data-anglearc="250" data-linecap="round" data-fgcolor="#5ebd5e">
*Check for data-cursor 
<input type="text" ng-model="knobnumber" knob data-width="100" data-height="100" data-thickness=".25" data-cursor="true" data-fgcolor="#e5635f">
*Check for data-cursor 
<input type="text" ng-model="knobnumber" knob data-width="150" data-max="170" data-cursor=true data-thickness=".5" data-fgcolor="#AAAAAA" data-bgcolor="#FFFFFF" data-displayinput="true">
